meta.name: The Dream Eaters CPA 2025
meta.description: Join the MythosBusters Discord server for the August 2025 Campaign Play-Along of The Dream Eaters!
meta.author: CPA Organizers

cards.name: Dreaming of Sleep
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract when assembling investigator decks, and only if you are playing The Dream-Quest. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - After choosing investigators, flip this card over.

cards.name: Dreaming of Sleep
cards.text: Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness (The Dream-Eaters #233). For the remainder of this campaign, any time the bearer of the False Awakening weakness leaves the campaign for any reason, choose a new investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness, and add it to that investigator's deck. Forced - If an investigator is instructed to add False Awakening to their deck, the bearer takes 1 mental trauma instead.

cards.name: The Cat's Pajamas
cards.text: Boon. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, add Cat Mask and Katarina Sojka to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When an investigator has "broken the law of Ulthar": Exile all copies of Cat Mask and Katarina Sojka (wherever they are) and remove them from the card pool for the remainder of this campaign.

cards.name: Fear Made Manifest
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation, and only if you are playing The Dream-Quest.
When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.
Then, add the Your Worst Nightmare weakness to your deck.
Then, in your Campaign Log, next to "Evidence of Kadath", record 1 tally mark.

cards.name: Sleeping to Dream
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract when assembling investigator decks, and only if you are playing The Web of Dreams. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - After choosing investigators, flip this card over.

cards.name: Sleeping to Dream
cards.text: Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness (The Dream-Eaters #275). For the remainder of this campaign, any time the bearer of the False Awakening weakness leaves the campaign for any reason, choose a new investigator to become the bearer of the False Awakening weakness, and add it to that investigator's deck. Forced - If an investigator is instructed to add False Awakening to their deck, the bearer takes 1 physical trauma instead.

cards.name: Sleep Paralysis
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation, and only if you are playing The Web of Dreams.
When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.
Then, add the Narcolepsy weakness to your deck.
Whenever you check the number of tally marks recorded next to "Steps of the Bridge" in the Campaign Log, you are considered to have 3 fewer tally marks recorded there.

cards.name: Whispering Woods
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep. [reaction] When you draw a non-weakness encounter card: Look at cards from the top of the encounter deck until you look at a card with the hidden keyword, add it to your hand, and shuffle the rest into the encounter deck. Then, cancel all effects of the triggering card and discard it. Any investigator may trigger this ability. (Group limit once per game.) Forced - After advancing to Act 4a of Scenario I-A: Beyond the Gates of Sleep, search the encounter deck for Ancient Zoog and put it next to the agenda deck. For the remainder of the scenario, its Forced effect is active.

cards.name: Ultimate Infestation
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario I-B: Waking Nightmare. [reaction] When you would place a swarm card: Look at the top card of your deck. You may place that card as normal. Otherwise, you must place the next card of your deck (without looking at it). Any player may activate this ability. Limit once per round. Forced - When you are instructed to assemble the infestation bag, replace the tokens listed with: [skull], [skull], [tablet], [tablet], [tablet], [cultist], [cultist].

cards.name: Curiosity Killed the Cat
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after Interlude I: The Black Cat, and only if you asked for it. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Then, each investigator whose deck does not contain a weakness with the [[Madness]] trait must swap a basic weakness in their deck for a random basic weakness with the [[Madness]] trait. Flip this card over for the remainder of the campaign.

cards.name: "We're all mad here."
cards.text: Ultimatum. Forced - When gathering cards during setup, gather The Cheshire Cat from the Cheshire Cat encounter set. Put The Cheshire Cat (Frustrating Feline) into play in the lead investigator's play area. Forced - Whenever an investigator draws a [[Madness]] weakness: Flip the Cheshire Cat, then that investigator takes control of The Cheshire Cat, then that investigator may shuffle any number of cards from their hand back into their deck and draw that many cards.

cards.name: Adopted by Ulthar
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during Interlude I: The Black Cat, and only if the black cat is at your side. When you accept this contract, add the Pawralysis weakness to your deck for the remainder of the campaign. You have an additional ally slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Creature]] asset.

cards.name: Pawralysis
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Pawralysis to a non-weakness asset with the highest printed cost that takes up a hand slot or ally slot. If you cannot, shuffle Pawralysis back into your deck. Treat the attached asset as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]] and forced abilities). [action][action]: Pet the damned cat. Discard Pawralysis.

cards.name: Psychic Emanations
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during setup for Scenario II-B: A Thousand Shapes of Horror. Replace the Forced effect on Agenda 2a and 3a of Scenario II-B: A Thousand Shapes of Horror with: "Forced - At the start of your turn, if The Unnamable is ready, and if it is at your location or you are at a non-[[Graveyard]] location: Test [willpower] (2). Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 for each location away from The Unnamable you are. If you fail, it attacks you (even if it is not engaged)." Forced - If an investigator adds The Silver Key to their deck, flip this card over and add it to that investigator's deck.

cards.name: Psychic Emanations
cards.text: Permanent. Bearer of The Silver Key only. The Silver Key does not take up an accessory slot. [action]: Search your deck and discard pile for The Silver Key and add it to your hand. Forced - If another investigator becomes the bearer of The Silver Key, remove this card from your deck and add it to theirs (even if that investigator is taking part in a different campaign).

encounter_sets.name: A Thousand Shapes of Horror CPA 2025
Beyond the Gates of Sleep CPA 2025
